qas.question: What sutras were transmitted in secret?
What sutras could have been preserved in non-human worlds?
What tradition says that sutras might have come from other Buddhas or Bodhisattvas?

context: According to <a0_0><a1_0><a2_0>Mahayana<a1_0/><a0_0/> tradition<a2_0/>, the Mahayana sutras were transmitted in secret, came from other Buddhas or Bodhisattvas, or were preserved in non-human worlds because human beings at the time could not understand them:
